channel.title: Online Help Revision is
channel.description:
....639 is my revision so if you know how to make it online,thanks.
-All I need help is Port Fowarding and possibily changing my IP,thanks DW.
[ Skype: Bacreator ]
Lets just say you get a little staff position if it gets online.

item.title: Online Help Revision is
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You must make sure that in the firewall configuration of your OS that you have added an exception to allow incoming and outgoing connections for port 43594 or any other port the server uses.

If you look in the tutorial section you will see a stickyed thread that has all the information you will need to get a server online, if you cannot help your self then why even ask others to do it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Online Help Revision is
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

Portforwarding tutorial

all you need is:
http://www.no-ip.com
(you need to create a host)

utorrent.com

µTorrent - a (very) tiny BitTorrent client

The official µTorrent® (uTorrent) torrent client for Windows, Mac, Android and Linux-- uTorrent is the #1 BitTorrent download client on desktops worldwide.


and a server.

1.) Open your no-ip (when you have a host)
2.) Click add Host
3.) Now minimize that
4.) Open utorrent
5.) Go to Prefrencess and change the port to the port you want.
6.)run the server
7.)if you get (server is allready running on that port) then close utorrent and then the server, open the server back up.

And there you have it.

Read full topic
